snippet.title: Sorting Sortilege - A retro-multiplayer arcade game inspired by Twinkle Star Sprites and Tetris 99!
snippet.description:
Download for free on itch.io https://hwilson.itch.io/sorting-sortilege?ac=qfCyYFQF-yt a mix between Twinkle Star Sprites and Tetris 99: fly your witch around colourful blocks, and zap them to send stacking trash blocks to your opponent's screen. There are special blocks, too!

➡️ More from Harley Wilson https://hwilson.itch.io/?ac=qfCyYFQF-yt
➡️ More multiplayer games https://itch.io/games/tag-multiplayer?ac=qfCyYFQF-yt

#itchio #indiegames
